name: Copy of Nexus Support Hub V26
description:
Nexus Support Hub – Presentation

An intelligent help desk featuring our AI assistant 'Nexus'. Get instant support, manage tickets efficiently with role-based dashboards, and use voice commands for a hands-free experience.

Key Features:

24/7 AI-powered chat assistant

Automatic ticket categorization and prioritization

Role-based dashboards (User, Agent, Manager)

Voice command and speech synthesis

Multilingual support (English, French, Arabic)

Payment Plan (via PayPal)

Freemium Plan: Up to 3 agents, 200 tickets/month

Standard Plan: €10 per agent/month (unlimited tickets, full AI features)

Pro Plan: €20 per agent/month (includes all Standard features, voice commands, multilingual support, and appointment scheduling)

Payments processed securely via PayPal.

User Manual (Quick Start)

Sign Up: Create your company account (as a Manager) or join an existing one.

AI Assistant: Start a chat with 'Nexus' to get instant help. The AI is powered by Google Gemini.

Manage Tickets: Use your role-based dashboard to view, assign, and resolve tickets.

Voice Commands: Enable microphone permissions to use voice input and receive spoken responses (Pro plan feature).

For further help, contact us at: hubnexusinfo@gmail.com
